version.text:
Here the profile and additional fields can be selected to be printed in the PDF document. On "position" the X and Y coordinates are specified.

You can also specify for each field one, compared to the standard settings deviating configuration.

Syntax:
Font: F=Text (e.g. F=Arial)
Font style: A=B or I or U (e.g. A=B)
Font size: S=size in pt (e.g. S=20)
Font color:C=RGB value (e.g. C=0,0,255)
Gender: T=Text for male,text for female (e.g. T=Mr.,Mrs.)
Before text: {=Text in front of a field (e.g. {=Hallo )
Suffix text: {=Text behind a field (e.g. {=,)

Syntax of the additional fields:
Date: D=Format parameter of the function date() (e.g. D=d.m.y), standard setting is d.m.Y
Text: V=any text (z.B. V=Attention)
Profilephoto: L=Filename (z.B. L=logo.jpg), without a parameter, an existing profile photo is displayed

 Example:
Description: Declaration
Last name: 10,20 (-> means last name at position 10,20) 
First name: 10,40;S=7;F=Arial (-> means first name at position 10,40 with font Arial 7pt) 
Address: 40,20;C=255,102,255;A=B (-> means address at position 40,20 with font color pink in bold)
Gender: 40,20,60,20;T=Mr.,Mrs. (-> means, depending on the gender, the text Mr. at position 40,20 or the text Mrs. at position 60,20)
Choose the form configuration that is to be used
Here is a form configuration is chosen on the basis of the PDF file is generated.\n\nUse the menu item -Settings- any number of configurations form can be generated.
Here the list is selected, the configuration should be used.\n\nOnly evaluated the conditions are hereby specified for a field. Fields without condition for this request are not important.
Here the role is selected, the Members shall be used
Delete only data of the current organization.
- When you delete the data, an error has occurred..\n
- The created data has been cleared.\n
\nTo completely remove the plugin now the browser must be closed and the program files and the link in the menu must be removed. The "Next" button initializes the plugin again with default values.
- The table "adm_plugin_preferences" could not be deleted because it houses more data from other plugins.\n
About the uninstall generated by the plugin entries can be deleted from the database.
Choose from the scope of the installation.\n\n***ATTENTION: This routine deletes only the entries in the Admidio database. Program files and the link in the menu will not be deleted! ***
Displays the name of the configuration is entered\n\nA configuration can be deleted by the contents of the field description is deleted.
Allows the documentation of the plugin can be opened (An existing Internet connection is required because the data is located on admidio.org).
ERROR: At least one configuration to be present!
ERROR: In each configuration, at least one field with content and position must be specified!
Here, the default font is set.
Here, the default font style is set.
Here, the default font size is set.
Here, the default font color is set.

Here arbitrary forms can be configured. The Description field must be filled.

A configuration can be deleted by the contents of the field description will be deleted. To view the data of a profile field must be specified at least one X and a Y coordinate. The data for X and Y define here the horizontal and vertical position relative to the upper left corner of the form. .

You can also specify for each profile field a different configuration.

To print labels following information in the label field are required: Number of columns, column spacing, line number, line spacing (e.g. 5,50,10,40 means array of labels to 5 columns at a distance of 50mm and 10 lines at a distance of 40mm)

max. PDF view is the maximum number of pages that must have a PDF document, so it is still displayed on the screen. If the number of sides increases, the download of the file is immediately available.
Here is the PDF file is selected, the data is written\n\nIf no file is selected, a new, empty PDF document in A4 format, high, is generated, which is described with the data.
Choose from the rollers, whose members may call the plugin.
Choose from the rollers, whose members may access the settings of the plugin.
Choose a list from which the configuration should be used
Select a role from the list of members is to be used
At least one parameter is missing.
